/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, is teeming with cars and motorcycles, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades adding to the urban charm of the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft light over the city. The predominant colors in the image are shades of gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements.
